postnl.title: PostNL
postnl.name: PostNL
postnl.specificerrmsg: This shipping method is currently unavailable. If you would like to ship using this shipping method, please contact us.

POSTNL-0001.message: You have configured the extension for test mode only. You still must enter a live username and password before you may use the extension for real shipments.

POSTNL-0002.message: You have not yet fully configured the extension. You must complete this process before you can use it.

POSTNL-0003.message: You have not yet configured the extension to use GlobalPack shipments. Please complete this process if you wish to ship parcels to outside the EU.

POSTNL-0004.message: You have not yet configured PostNL Checkout. Please complete this process if you wish to use PostNL Checkout.

POSTNL-0005.message: You currently do not use split street lines. Not using split street lines may cause errors in shipment processing as PostNL cannot support every possible address syntax. We strongly recommend using split street lines to avoid problems when using PostNL shipping. For more information, please contact PostNL support.

POSTNL-0006.message: PostNL: It appears that your cron is not working properly. PostNL requires the cron to be active in order to function.

POSTNL-0007.message: An error occurred whilst processing your request:

POSTNL-0008.message: Please fill in your unique and private keys and try again.

POSTNL-0009.message: This action cannot be used on non-PostNL shipments.

POSTNL-0010.message: An error occurred while processing this action.

POSTNL-0011.message: Please select one or more orders.

POSTNL-0013.message: Please select one or more shipments.

POSTNL-0109.message: The confirm action is currently unavailable.

POSTNL-0115.message: No data available for GetDeliveryDay request.

POSTNL-0118.message: Invalid postcode supplied for getNearestLocations request: %s

POSTNL-0119.message: Invalid coordinates supplied for getNearestLocations request. lat: %s, long: %s

POSTNL-0120.message: Invalid arguments supplied. getNearestLocations requires a postcode or a longitude and latitude.

POSTNL-0124.message: Invalid arguments supplied. GetDeliveryTimeframes requires a postcode and a housenumber.

POSTNL-0125.message: Invalid postcode supplied for GetDeliveryTimeframes request: %s Postcodes may only contain 4 numbers and 2 letters.

POSTNL-0126.message: Invalid housenumber supplied for GetDeliveryTimeframes request: %s Housenumbers may only contain digits.

POSTNL-0127.message: Invalid shipping duration: %s. Shipping duration must be between 1 and 14 days.

POSTNL-0128.message: Invalid arguments supplied. getNearestLocationsInArea requires two sets of coordinates.

POSTNL-0129.message: Invalid NE coordinates supplied for getLocationsInArea request. lat: %s, long: %s

POSTNL-0130.message: Invalid SW coordinates supplied for getLocationsInArea request. lat: %s, long: %s

POSTNL-0131.message: Invalid postcode supplied for GetDeliveryDate request: %s Postcodes may only contain 4 numbers and 2 letters.

POSTNL-0132.message: PostNL delivery options are only available for Dutch shipping addresses.

POSTNL-0133.message: You have not yet enabled PostNL delivery options.

POSTNL-0134.message: The SOAP extension is not installed. PostNL requires the SOAP extension to communicate with PostNL.

POSTNL-0135.message: The OpenSSL extension is not installed. The PostNL extension requires the OpenSSL extension to secure the communications with the PostNL servers.

POSTNL-0136.message: The specified method "%s" is not callable.

POSTNL-0137.message: The MCrypt extension is not installed. The PostNL extension requires the MCrypt extension to secure the communications with the PostNL servers.

POSTNL-0138.message: Invalid arguments supplied. In order to save a selected option, a type, delivery date and optional extra costs are required.

POSTNL-0140.message: Invalid extra costs supplied: %s Extra costs must be supplied as a float.

POSTNL-0141.message: Invalid argument supplied. A valid PakjeGemak address must contain at least a city, country code, street, house number, phonenumber and zipcode.

POSTNL-0142.message: Invalid arguments supplied. The 'costs' parameter is required.

POSTNL-0148.message: Invalid arguments supplied. The 'number' parameter is required.

POSTNL-0150.message: The quote's total weight is below the miniumum required to use PostNL delivery options.

POSTNL-0152.message: Invalid arguments supplied. The 'costs' parameter requires an amount incl. and excl. VAT.

POSTNL-0153.message: Invalid fee amount entered: %s incl. VAT. Please enter a value between 0.00 and 2.00 EUR incl. VAT.

POSTNL-0155.message: The current user is not allowed to perform this action.

POSTNL-0156.message: The PostNL extension v%s has been successfully installed.

POSTNL-0159.message: You have chosen a default shipping option that is not supported. Please only select default options that you have selected in the 'Select supported option' field.
